startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front, feet together and hands besides the buttocks, or sit with a cross-legged pose. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Extend the right arm sideways at the shoulder level, place fingers of the right hand on the right shoulder and keep the left hand on the left knee.
Rotate the right elbow clockwise 5 times.
Rotate the right elbow anti-clockwise 5 times.
Extend the left arm sideways at the shoulder level, place fingers of the left hand on the left shoulder and keep the right hand on the right knee.
Rotate the left elbow clockwise 5 times.
Rotate the left elbow anti-clockwise 5 times.
Extend both the arms sideways at the shoulder level, place fingers of the right hand on right shoulder and of the left hand on the left shoulder.

Fully rotate both the elbows at the same time in a large circle clockwise 5 times. Touch the elbows in the front of the chest on the forward movement, touch the ears while moving up, and touch the sides of the trunk while coming down.

Fully rotate both the elbows at the same time in a large circle anti-clockwise 5 times. Touch the elbows in the front of the chest on the forward movement, touch the ears while moving up, and touch the sides of the trunk while coming down.
